Name: Beggar's Banquet
Instructions: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with beer.
Review: If using a 12oz glass you'll know you have great ice if when strained into glass you have sufficient room for 60ml (2oz) of beer.
History: Created in 2010 by Aisha Sharpe in New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Beggar's Banquet contains 256 calories
